step_feedback.feedback: Great start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on a smooth motion.
Good job reaching overhead. Try to keep your elbows slightly bent as you stretch up.
Nice fist and squeeze! Remember to inhale as you tighten your muscles and bring your shoulder blades together.
Excellent exhale and relax. Focus on a full stretch back overhead.
You're doing great! Ensure your fingers are spread wide when reaching overhead.
Second rep is looking good. Maintain that comfortable posture.
Good reach overhead. Keep the focus on a controlled movement.
Well done with the fist and squeeze! Remember to breathe in deeply during this phase.
Great job relaxing and exhaling. Aim for a full extension.
Fantastic finish to the second set! Keep those fingers spread wide as you reach up.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers spread wide when reaching overhead and to inhale as you squeeze your shoulder blades together. Focus on smooth, controlled movements throughout.
